irlmod.settingDedicatedPlayerUsernameHin: Enter the exact username for the IRL Player View. No password recommended for easier login.
irlmod.settingSplashImageURL.name: Splash Image URL
irlmod.settingSplashImageURL.hint: URL for the image to display on the player screen when toggled. Leave blank for no splash image.
IRLMOD.settings.tvPhysicalWidth.name: Player TV - Physical Width (inches)
IRLMOD.settings.tvPhysicalWidth.hint: The physical width of your player-facing TV screen in inches.
IRLMOD.settings.tvResolutionWidth.name: Player TV - Resolution Width (pixels)
IRLMOD.settings.tvResolutionWidth.hint: The horizontal resolution of your player-facing TV screen in pixels (e.g., 1920 or 3840).
IRLMOD.settings.tvDesiredGridInches.name: Player TV - Desired Grid Size (inches)
IRLMOD.settings.tvDesiredGridInches.hint: The desired physical size for each grid square on the player TV (e.g., 1.0 for 1-inch squares).
irlmod.settingPiServerIP.name: Raspberry Pi Server IP
irlmod.settingPiServerIP.hint: The local IP address of the Raspberry Pi running the touch input server.
irlmod.settingPiServerPort.name: Raspberry Pi Server Port
irlmod.settingPiServerPort.hint: The port number the touch input server on the Raspberry Pi is listening on.
irlmod.settingPlayerPerformanceMode.name: Player View Performance Mode
irlmod.settingPlayerPerformanceMode.hint: Sets the rendering performance mode for the dedicated IRL Player View window. 'Auto' uses Foundry's default.
